sub_fields.label: Native or iFrame
sub_fields.name: native_or_iframe
sub_fields.message: Native: upload a video file / iFrame: embed a video from Vimeo

sub_fields.label: Video
sub_fields.name: video
sub_fields.instructions: Enter Vimeo video number here. If the video URL is https://vimeo.com/131632793 you just need to enter 131632793

sub_fields.label: Preview Image
sub_fields.name: preview_image
sub_fields.instructions: This image will appear behind the video. This is just incase the video doesn't load.

sub_fields.label: Full Width Video
sub_fields.name: full_width_video
sub_fields.instructions: Do you want the video to be full width or width the page grid line?

sub_fields.label: Autoplay Video
sub_fields.name: autoplay
sub_fields.instructions: Do you want to autoplay this video?

sub_fields.label: Overlay
sub_fields.name: overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Do you want a text overlay over this video?

sub_fields.label: Text Position Options
sub_fields.name: video_text_position
sub_fields.instructions: Where would like the text overlay to sit?

sub_fields.label: Show Slide Arrows
sub_fields.name: show_arrows
sub_fields.message: Show clickable arrows that change the slides, displayed left and right

sub_fields.label: Show Slide Dots
sub_fields.name: show_dots
sub_fields.message: Display scrollable buttons that represent the slides

sub_fields.label: Links Title
sub_fields.name: links_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add an optional title for this links section block

sub_fields.label: Side Menu
sub_fields.name: side_menu
sub_fields.instructions: Enable optional side menu. This is for use when this section is the top section under the header and will automatically display all sibling pages of the current page

sub_fields.label: Page Link
sub_fields.name: link
sub_fields.instructions: Select the page you want this section to link to

sub_fields.label: Reverse Layout
sub_fields.name: reverse
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to reverse column order on larger screens

sub_fields.label: Bars at Top
sub_fields.name: bars_at_top
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to put vertical bar pattern at the top of the flex as opposed to the default position at the bottom

sub_fields.label: Bars at Side
sub_fields.name: bars_at_side
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to put vertical bar pattern at the side of the flex as opposed to the default position at the bottom

sub_fields.label: Small Title
sub_fields.name: small_title
sub_fields.instructions: If no value is entered then the title of the page you are linking to will be displayed

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Add an image for your selected post

sub_fields.label: Block Colour Style
sub_fields.name: block_colour_style
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to switch to card style version with coloured backgrounds. This will only work for 2 posts not 3

sub_fields.label: Add Background
sub_fields.name: add_background
sub_fields.instructions: Adds a light blue background colour to the section if selected

sub_fields.label: Centre Align
sub_fields.name: center_align
sub_fields.instructions: Will centre align all card content

sub_fields.label: Add Background
sub_fields.name: add_background
sub_fields.instructions: Adds a light blue background colour to the section if selected

sub_fields.label: Page Link
sub_fields.name: page_link
sub_fields.instructions: Select which page you would like to link to

sub_fields.label: Four Columns
sub_fields.name: four_columns
sub_fields.instructions: Enable for four column layout intead of three for cards below

sub_fields.label: Add Background
sub_fields.name: add_background
sub_fields.instructions: Adds a light blue background colour to the section if selected

sub_fields.label: Sub Team Heading
sub_fields.name: sub_team_heading
sub_fields.instructions: Optional - to break the staff up into smaller sub groups

sub_fields.label: Staff Cards
sub_fields.name: staff_cards
sub_fields.instructions: Add Team Members
